head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths D'AGOSTINO, FRANK T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths D'AGOSTINO, FRANK T.

block.p: D'AGOSTINO-Frank T. On February 13, 1998. Beloved husband of Mari. Loving father of Donna, Debbie and Denise. Devoted father -in-law of Jim. Cherished grandfather of Eric and Chelsea. Fond brother of Anne and Sonny. Reposing at the Frederick Funeral Home of Flushing, Northern Blvd, corner of 193rd St. Visiting hours Sunday and Monday, 2-4 PM, and 7-10 PM. Funeral Mass Tuesday, 9:45 AM, St. Mel's R.C. Church. Interment Mt. St. Mary's Cemetery.
